name: Super Marvin Paint
description:
Super Marvin Paint was made in the 42 Madrid Fall Game Jam on october 2021, the theme was: "Color change everything".

This is a platform puzzle game about a blackhole that absorb the colors and now Marvin is trying to get them back.

Made by:

izenynn (AKA: dpoveda-)

rdbdesigner (AKA: rcuesta-)

nicolike (AKA: nortolan)

mexil77 (AKA: emgarcia)
